rules_text:
When Moorla Counseling enters, target creature you control explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]Ferocious[/i] – Attacking creatures you control with base power 4 or greater have trample.
